reviews.name: Ramya
reviews.review: Sounds there is a problem with sound of incoming calls ringing only one or two times then silenced very difficult to receive calls I tried in settings but could not succeed please do the needful
reviews.title: Dissatisfied

reviews.name: Saurabh
reviews.review: I do not trust products sold on Amazon..my phone after 6 months stopped working and as it was in warranty I could get a replacement from apple after lot of hassle. No more buying phone from Amazon.
reviews.title: Phone is nice but can't trust Amazon purchase

reviews.name: Sarthak Chauhan
reviews.review: Even after an year of heavy usage the battery health is at 98%. Got it for 38k last year. Best budget iPhone.
reviews.title: Amazing phone.

reviews.name: Mrid
reviews.review: Don't go for "Exchange Value" lolipop, its not worth it. The value for the exchanged phone given by amazon is undervalued, you can get a better deal on Cashify.com (only in selected city) and the amazon delivery guy who is also happened to be verification guy will also check your phone for any scratch or defect (like a jeweler) will reject upfront if he find any defect even a hairline and you will not get the New Phone as well even if you try to pay the balance amount. Then you have to re-order the phone once they canceled your current order. Its a hectic process for under valued exchange offer. Not sure what they expect from an old phone.
reviews.title: Exchange Value!

reviews.name: Rajesh
reviews.review: Good condition and quality phone one use rich people use ...,. sounds quality camera qualityhdr and osm phone then better...
reviews.title: Only rich people use ... iPhone xr.... good quality phone....

reviews.name: shubhankar
reviews.review: The In-box headphones DO NOT WORK. The phone is fine but the headphones dont work.
reviews.title: iPhone

reviews.name: Bharti
reviews.review: Battery is very powerful then all other iPhone
reviews.title: iPhone XR

reviews.name: G.sridhar
reviews.review: It's Apple, what do you expect? Nothing to note, works as intended and arrived in a pristine package.Well screen resolution could be better, but even at 720p it's not that noticible. 3GB RAM is a problem as with IOS 14, 87% of it is filled on boot.
reviews.title: Apple Red is delicious.

reviews.name: Devkumar
reviews.review: This phone is my update from iPhone se old one and this is done a great job .Thanks apple
reviews.title: Amazing product

reviews.name: Meera
reviews.review: Awesome phone..bought on a sale..received it on time and in a good package. Bought for 49K..worth the price..working fine after using it for 1 year.
reviews.title: Great
